name: A.L.B
description:
___Overview :

Fight your way in the desolate lands of "Ground 2".

In this Action Hack and Slash game, you need to lead Arabel to the end of her journey to shut up "You", a voice in her head guiding her to an unknown place.


___
Features :

  • LOADS of action! Combine your attacks and unleash an endless flow of chaos inducing destruction upon the waves of enemies you will encounter.
  • Evolve into a mass destruction being! Gain strength the more enemies you defeat! Nothing will stand in your way to achieve your goals!
  • Decide your future! Something hidden that may put an end to everything. Maybe will it bring you the salvation you seek.

___
Personal note :

Since my games all share the same world, I wanted to show what started it all by making  you leading this universe to its turning point.
I really hope you will enjoy this short adventure.

PS : I'm trying to make a living out of my creations, so if you have a tip to spare, I would highly appreciate your support.
